page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content:
Most activities take place either on the local sprots fields or at one of the Centres specially built for the purpose. A survey produced the following attendances at recreational organisations- football 132 tennis 67 gardening 223 gymnastics 47 walking 197 dancing 60 modelling 42 fishing 67 squash 42 sailing 26 golf 37 running 122 reading 163 horse-riding 22 swimming 228 judo 22 sewing 107 snooker 133 keep fit 77
The groups usually meet once per week from September to April. Some groups operate throughout the yer, whilst others have a break in the summer.
